analysis.key_quote: Reclassifying career civil service employees who develop funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize the NIH & other federal agencies, reduce public trust in Federally-funded science, and reduce our ability to identify future cures for diseases that impact all Americans, regardless of political ideology.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of federal agencies and the loss of continuity in government services, which aligns with themes of nonpartisan governance and institutional integrity.
